title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: The file is saved without a file extension and the icon is changed to a generic file icon. The file is opened as text when it should be opened with the appropriate application.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless explicitly changed. The icon should remain as the parent java file icon.
SR: Ensure that the file is saved with the correct file extension and the icon remains as the parent java file icon when using SaveAs option. Opening the saved file should open it with the appropriate application.
